amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to require the Occupational Safety and Health Administration to promulgate a final standard on workplace violence prevention for health care and social service workers. Also requires OSHA to follow the established rulemaking process.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require the Occupational Safety and Health Administration to promulgate a final standard on workplace violence prevention for health care and social service workers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 238 (Roll no. 637).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Byrne.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 238 (Roll no. 637).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
